endpoints.name: List Patients
endpoints.description: API to fetch the patients from the practice.

params.name: facility_id
params.description: Long values separated by comma, or the string 'ALL'. Filters patient records that were mapped to any of the facilities in the given facility IDs. If 'ALL' is passed, then patients from all the facilities will be fetched.

params.name: full_name_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose full name starts with given string

params.name: full_name_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose full name contains given string

params.name: full_name
params.description: Filters the patients whose full name matches the given string

params.name: first_name_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose first name starts with given string

params.name: first_name_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose first name contains given string

params.name: first_name
params.description: Filters the patients whose first name matches the given string

params.name: last_name_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose last name starts with given string

params.name: last_name_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose last name contains given string

params.name: last_name
params.description: Filters the patients whose last name matches the given string

params.name: record_id_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose Record ID starts with given string

params.name: record_id_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose Record ID contains given string

params.name: record_id
params.description: Filters the patient whose Record ID matches the given string

params.name: category_id
params.description: Filters the patients whose category belongs to the given Category ID

params.name: gender
params.description: Filters patients with the given gender. Allowed Values: male, female, unknown, other

params.name: dob
params.description: Filters patients whose Date of Birth equals to the given string. Format: yyyy-mm-dd

params.name: email_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose Email starts with given string

params.name: email_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose Email contains given string

params.name: email
params.description: Filters the patient whose email matches the given string

params.name: mobile_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose Mobile Number starts with given string

params.name: mobile_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose Mobile Number contains given string

params.name: mobile
params.description: Filters the patients whose mobile matches the given string

params.name: home_phone_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose Home Phone starts with given string

params.name: home_phone_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose Home Phone contains given string

params.name: home_phone
params.description: Filters the patient whose Home Phone matches the given string

params.name: work_phone_startswith
params.description: Filters the patients whose Work Phone starts with given string

params.name: work_phone_contains
params.description: Filters the patients whose Work Phone contains given string

params.name: work_phone
params.description: Filters the patient whose Work Phone matches the given string

params.name: created_date_start
params.description: Filters patient records that were created on or after given string. Format: yyyy-mm-dd

params.name: created_date_end
params.description: Filters patient records that were created on or before given string. Format: yyyy-mm-dd

params.name: filter_by
params.description: Filters patient records based on their status. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Inactive

params.name: modified_time_greater_than
params.description: Filters patients that were modified after the given timestamp

params.name: modified_time_less_than
params.description: Filters patients that were modified before the given timestamp

params.name: modified_time_greater_equals
params.description: Filters patients that were modified on or after the given timestamp

params.name: modified_time_less_equals
params.description: Filters patients that were modified on or before the given timestamp

params.name: is_phr_account_available
params.description: Filters patients with or without phr account.

params.name: gender_identity
params.description: Filters patients whose Gender Identity is equal to the given string.

params.name: state
params.description: Filters patients whose state is equal to the given string.

params.name: city
params.description: Filters patients whose city is equal to the given string.

params.name: country
params.description: Filters patients whose country is equal to the given string.

params.name: postal_code
params.description: Filters patients whose zip code/postal code is equal to the given string.

params.name: county
params.description: Filters patients whose county is equal to the given string.

params.name: district
params.description: Filters patients whose district is equal to the given string.

params.name: age_greater_equals
params.description: Filters patients whose age is equal or greater than the given number.

params.name: age_lesser_equals
params.description: Filters patients whose age is equal or less than the given number.

params.name: patient_ids
params.description: Long values separated by comma. Filters patients whose patient identifier is in the given list.

params.name: blood_group
params.description: Filters patients whose blood group is equal to the given string.

params.name: language
params.description: Filters patients whose language is equal to the given string.

params.name: maritalStatus
params.description: Filters patients whose marital status is equal to the given string. Allowed Values: Single, Married, Other

params.name: source
params.description: Filters patients whose source is equal to the given string.

params.name: category
params.description: Filters patients whose category is equal to the given string

params.name: sort_order
params.description: Allowed Values - A, D. A - Ascending; D - Descending.

params.name: sort_column
params.description: Allowed Value - created_time|first_name|last_name|full_name|record_id

params.name: page
params.description: Page number

params.name: per_page
params.description: Number of records per page
